message.body: Thank you Will! How are you? How was your birthday.
I'm good, worried bout all my friends in the city! My birthday was fun, my mom came to visit and we went clothes shopping. And I partied with my hall mates obvi. How are you?
Haha thats great! Really, sounds like a fun time. Espesh since your mom came down and when she left, you got CRUNK.

Also, my internet is shitting itself and there is a wind like nothing i've seen before and there are things taking off already. Some cars have moved. Hoever, everyone is safe, and i appreciate your concern!
